events.message: The applicant has submitted a personal loan application to cover medical expenses and consolidate existing debts.
The loan application was categorized correctly under personal loans based on the applicant's stated purpose.
A loan officer with expertise in personal loans has been assigned to review the application and guide the applicant.
Initial review completed verifying the applicant's eligibility and checking the basic loan parameters.
Additional documents were requested from the applicant, including proof of income and medical bills.
Applicant has submitted all requested documents including recent payslips, medical statements, and identification.
Credit check completed showing a stable credit history with some existing debt that is manageable.
Risk assessment concluded the applicant is medium risk due to medical expenses but income is sufficient.
A loan offer was presented to the applicant detailing interest rate, repayment terms, and loan amount approved.
The applicant reviewed the offer and provided positive feedback agreeing to the proposed terms and conditions.
Loan was formally approved by the credit committee after confirming all documents and assessments.
The approved personal loan amount has been successfully disbursed to the applicantâ€™s designated bank account.
A follow-up call was made to the applicant to ensure satisfaction with the loan disbursement and repayment plan.
The loan application process has been closed after confirming all steps completed and applicant informed.
